Performance Max - Setup Final Checks
Expect a few weeks of chop. If you are lucky, 1 or 2 weeks, usually 4 to 6 weeks
B2B advertisers should avoid PMax
Location options: Target people in or regularly in your targeted locations
URL Expansion: If you leave "On", make sure to add exclusions
No big changes for new campaigns (keep bidding and budget tweaks to a min)
For Lead Gen with less than 30 conversions per month, start CPA 10% higher
For Ecommerce with less that 50 conversions per month, start ROAS 10% lower
Allow at least 2 weeks and >30 conversions before raising bids
Assets: If you are running Naked Shopping, you can ignore the options below:
Up to 5 headlines and long headlines
Up to 5 descriptions and logos
Up to 5 videos
Up to 20 images
